column4: What's the equivalent of "apt-get update" in the software center UI?
so it's not available on software center, thank you

Starminn: I was thinking of a tutorial for this use case: a person opens software-center and wants to install a program. His sources might be out of date, so I need to tell him to update them before installing it. So he needs to run 2 programs, while with synaptic he just needs to run 1.
